@ashishwadekar @citizen428 @middlemanapp @Netlify Hosting "static" sites from a CDN has different cost implications to keeping a server (virtual or otherwise) up, so it can be cost effective at this scale. The more involved features introduce costs when usage mounts, and other pro features/support-levels cost $
